name: soggily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unpleasantly wet and soft because of having absorbed a lot of liquid: The festival banners dripped soggily from lamp posts. He failed to catch his biscuit before it collapsed soggily onto the floor. See
soggy
More examplesFewer examplesHe took the teabag out and set it soggily into his saucer.The squish of her shoes sounded soggily behind me.I was sitting in a laundrette and watching my underwear revolve soggily for hours.
